title: We’re Hiring: Ads Manager (Remote | PH Preferred)
job_overview:
Location: 100% Remote (PH applicants strongly preferred)
 Start Date: ASAP
 Experience: 1–2 Years in Digital Advertising

About the Role
You’re obsessed with ROAS.
You split-test in your sleep.
 And you know the difference between a click and an actual customer.
If you’ve scaled ad campaigns across Meta, Google, or YouTube — and have the receipts to prove it — we want you on board.
This isn’t your average “run some ads and hope for the best” role.
We’re looking for a performance-driven Ads Manager who thrives on data, creativity, and results.

What You’ll Do:
• Launch and manage paid campaigns across Meta, Google, and YouTube
• Monitor performance, optimize in real time, and scale what works
• Collaborate with creatives and copywriters to produce conversion-focused assets
• Build and manage retargeting flows, A/B tests, and audience segmentation
• Analyze results and create easy-to-digest reports with clear insights

What You Bring:
• 1–2 years of experience managing paid ad campaigns
• Familiarity with Meta Business Suite, Google Ads, and YouTube ad platform
• Strong understanding of performance marketing, funnels, and analytics
• Ability to manage and optimize campaigns based on data (not guesswork)
• Portfolio or sample results that show impact

Bonus if you have:
• Experience working with SaaS, agencies, or digital brands
• Experience scaling budgets and building evergreen ad systems
• Hands-on knowledge of tracking tools like Pixel, GTM, UTM, or third-party dashboards

Perks & Benefits:
• Remote-first: Work from anywhere in the Philippines
• Collaborative culture: Creative, agile team that loves to test, iterate, and grow
• Room to experiment: You’ll get the freedom to test ideas and scale what works
• Recognition: Your wins will be celebrated and rewarded
• Professional growth: Learn from a team that supports your career evolution
• Monthly PTO: Recharge regularly with paid time off
• Maternity/paternity leave: For eligible long-term teaUpgrade to see actual infombers (1+ year + performance-based)
• Event rewards: Earn points for team event participation, and cash them in for cool stuff

? How to Apply:

 iadsmanager (or use the phrase given in your job post)

3. Attach your portfolio or relevant work samples when prompted.

No fluff. No bloated processes. Just real work, real growth, and a team that respects what you bring to the table.
